MS MCQs

    Work with jobs and resources in Dynamics 365 Business Central

    »

    1. What are the two layers of job planning in Business Central?

      Job action lines and Job task lines

      Job task lines and Job schedule lines

      Job revenue lines and Job cost lines

      Job task lines and Job planning lines


    2. In some of your jobs, you use a warehouse lift. What do you need to do to set up the warehouse lift for a job so that you can analyze its cost and profit for that job?

      Create an item of the type Job for the warehouse lift.

      Create a resource of the type Machine for the warehouse lift.

      Create a fixed asset of the type Machine for the warehouse lift.

      Create a fixed asset of the type Job for the warehouse lift.
